grants.name: Jessy's Hacker House
grants.description: Jessy is helping the BuidlGuidl find high-impact up-and-coming devs. Our goal is to fund developers on the edge and help them remain free agents to have the most open source impact.

grants.name: Solidity By Example
grants.description: Solidity-by-example is the best solidity resource out there. It stays up-to-date and Taz is always adding new examples.

grants.name: W1nt3r
grants.description: W1nt3r created EVMFromScratch.com and many other engaging onchain apps. He is a model app builder on Ethereum.
